page.title: 12Woburn Lifestyle 4
page.content: {Woburn Garden Centre}is situated at the approach to Woburn Abbey. It specializes in shrubs and plants. The busiest time of the year is March to June, when they get about 2000 people at the weekend but not so many in the week. They get a few American tourists. Some of the sheds, pottery and stone statues sold are made locally. They also sell pet foods and fish. The{Camping Centre}is adjacent to the Garden Centre. It sells a wide variety of camping equipment including frame and trailer tents. Frame tents are most popular because people do not like pulling trailers on their cars. There is also a shop selling accessories ranging from camping cookers to torches. The busiest time of the year is July and August and when the weather is very hot.
